Room.Name: Orchard Lane
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Orchard Lane, south of the Swallow's Nest.
Room.LongDescription: The Swallow's Nest is a rather large bar exclusively for officers of the city guard. Although they do allow members of the other guard affiliations, they do not much care for outsiders, and will do whatever they can to get rid of people who do not belong there.
